column4: Hello all, I have a question about PnP OS settings in BIOS...
it means the BIOS will argue with Linux... and it'll win... and some things won't work... turn it off
is it normal that the charge monitor in gnome taking a l-o-n-g time identifying me plugging in the AC power cord and disconnecting it ?
iir GNOME 2.12 had some work done on that...
